name: NutCollector
description:
Collect 10 nuts before the snakes collect 10 nuts. Snakes will take your nuts so try to avoid them. If you are sneaky, you can steal the nuts from the Snakes.

You can only hold one nut at a time. The Green Arrow points toward your nest and the Red Arrow goes to the Snakes nest.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Sprint: Shift

Look - Mouse
